resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/76142</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>76142</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40ced87b-bc80-40fe-25d1-dd8718d2860e#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Tál sárga és fekete színezésű agyagfestéssel (Irán 10-11. Század) és tál lüszteres festéssel (Szíria 11-12. Század).</string>
            <string language="en">Dish with yellow and black colouring argillaceous painting (Iran 10-11th century)and dish with lustrine painting (Syria 11-12th century).</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Teller mit argillaceous Anstrich des gelben und 
schwarzen Farbtons (der Iran 10-1. century)and Teller mit lustrine 
Anstrich (Syrien 11-1. Jahrhundert).</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plat avec la peinture argileuse de coloration 
jaune et noire (10-11ème plat de century)and de l'Iran avec peinture 
de lustrine (11-12ème siècle de la Syrie).</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Prato com pintura argillaceous da coloração 
amarela e preta (prato do century)and de Irã 10-11o com pintura do 
lustrine (século de Syria 11-1ò).</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Piatto con la pittura argillacea di colouring 
giallo e nero (10-undicesimo piatto dal century)and dell'Iran con la 
pittura di lustrine (11-dodicesimo secolo della Siria).</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πιάτο με την κίτρινη και μαύρη αργιλώδη ζωγραφική 
χρωματισμού (πιάτο του Ιράν 10-11ος century)and με τη ζωγραφική
lustrine (11-12$ος αιώνας της Συρίας).</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Plato con la pintura arcillosa del colorante 
amarillo y negro (10-11o plato del century)and de Irán con la pintura
del lustrine (11-1ò siglo de Siria).</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">két tál arabeszkkel és figurális dísszel.</string>
            <string language="en">Two dishes with arabesque and figural ornamentation</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Szíria,  Irán,  </string>
            <string language="en">Syria, Iran</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zwei Teller mit Arabeske und figural Verzierung</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Deux plats avec l'arabesque et l'ornement figural</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dois pratos com arabesque e ornamentation figural</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Due piatti con il arabesque ed il ornamentation figural</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δύο πιάτα με το arabesque και την figural 
διακόσμηση</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dos platos con el arabesque y el ornamentation figural</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Syrien, Der Iran</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Syrie, Iran</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Syria, Irã</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Siria, Iran</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συρία, Ιράν</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Siria, Irán</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:Nemzeti Tankönyvkiadó Rt.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>76142</entry>
    </identifier>
